From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* The large alien creatures trampled through the thick forest vegitation 
with ease, destroying every-thing in their path. They only paused once in a 
while to check their barings. They where getting closer to their targets and 
where getting their weapons ready to finish their mission when their 
scanners abrubtly stopped. They halted in confusion, not knowing where to go 
or what to do. They converged into a circle, surrounding their leader, who 
at the moment was checking with a small computer on his arm. He looked up 
and spoke to the crowd of looming doom.*

< The targets have built a scrambling device, we have to resort to a 
physical ultra-viloet spectrum scan. Switch frequencies on comand...Now.>

* A wirring and buzzing sounded from their helmets, and they went limp, 
their systems matching their new sight program. After several seconds their 
heads snapped back up and they looked around and continued the way they had 
been going.*
